data.caption: Results -  For The Quarter And Nine Months Ending December 31 2025
data.news_body: North Eastern Carrying Corporation Limited (Company) has submitted to the Exchange the financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025 along with the Auditors Report.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30 2025
data.news_body: Copy of un-Audited Financial Results along with Limited Review Report received from Statutory Auditor of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025 are enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Un-Audited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30 2025
data.news_body: We are enclosing  Un-audited Financials Results  along with Limited  Review Report issued by the Statutory Auditor of the company for the quarter ended June 30 2025.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31 2025
data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors at their Meeting held today Wednesday May 28 2025 has Consider and Approved Audited Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended March 31 2025 as recommended by the Audit Committee.

data.caption: Un-Audited Results For The Quarter Ending December 31 2024
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulations 33 of SEBI(LODR) Regulations 2015 the Board of Directors of "North Eastern Carrying Corporation Limited" at its meeting held today i.e. Friday January 31 2025 has considered and approved the Un-Audited Financials Results of the Company along with Limited Review Report for the Quarter Ending December 31 2024 enclosed herewith.

data.news_body: Please find enclosed results

data.caption: Results As On 30.06.2024
data.news_body: Board meeting held on 31.07.2024 for consideration & approval of  results as on 30.06.2024

data.caption: Results For The Quarter & Year Ended 31.03.2024
data.news_body: The Board has approved the results for the qtr ended 31.03.2024

data.caption: Results For Quarter Ended 31.12.2023
data.news_body: Meeting of Board was held today i.e 14.02.2024 to consider & approve Results.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year September 30, 2023.
data.news_body: The Board has approved in its Meeting held on 27.10.2023 the un-audited financial results for the quarter ended 30.09.2023

data.caption: OUTCOME OF BOARD MEETING - IN TERMS OF REGULATION 30 (6) READ WITH REGULATION 33 OF SEBI (LISTING OBLIGATIONS AND DISCLOSURE REQUIREMENTS) REGULATIONS, 2015
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation SEBI (LODR), 2015, the Board of Directors at its meeting held on 14.08.2023 has approved  the unaudited financial results along with limited review report for the irst quarter ended 30.06.2023.

data.caption: Results-Financial Results For March 31, 2023
data.news_body: Further to our letter dated, May 22, 2023 and in compliance with Regulation 30 and 33 and other applicable Regulations, if any, of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the Board of Directors at their Meeting held today, Tuesday, May 30, 2023 has approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023 as recommended by the Audit Committee.

data.caption: UN-AUDITED FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE QUARTER ENDED 31.12.2022
data.news_body:
we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held today i.e Tuesday, February 14, 2023 at 1.30 P.M & concluded at 3.15 P.M, has approved the following:

1. Un-audited financial results of the Company along with the Limited Review Report for the third quarter ended December 31, 2022.
2. Appointment of Mr. Saurav Upadhyay (DIN: 05350001) , Mr. Ashutosh Kumar Dubey (DIN: 07621637) & Ms. Priya Singh (DIN: 08727539) as an Additional Directors (Non-Executive, Independent) based on the recommendation of the Nomination & Remuneration Committee with effect from 14th February, 2023, to hold office for a period of five years subject to approval of the members at the General Meeting of the Company
3.Considered and approved the notice calling the ensuing Extra Ordinary General Meeting of the shareholders of the Company

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for OUTCOME OF BOARD MEETING - IN TERMS OF REGULATION 30 (6) READ WITH REGULATION 33 OF SEBI (LISTING OBLIGATIONS AND DISCLOSURE REQUIREMENTS) REGULATIONS, 2015
data.news_body:
we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held today i.e Tuesday, February 14, 2023 at 1.30 P.M & concluded at 3.15 P.M, has approved the following:
1. Un-audited financial results of the Company along with the Limited Review Report for the third quarter ended December 31, 2022.
2. Appointment of Mr. Saurav Upadhyay (DIN: 05350001) , Mr. Ashutosh Kumar Dubey (DIN: 07621637) & Ms. Priya Singh (DIN: 08727539) as an Additional Directors (Non-Executive, Independent) based on the recommendation of the Nomination & Remuneration Committee with effect from 14th February, 2023, to hold office for a period of five years subject to approval of the members at the General Meeting of the Company.
3. Considered and approved the notice calling the ensuing Extra Ordinary General Meeting of the shareholders of the Company.

data.caption: Discrepancies In Financial Results
data.news_body: With reference to your mail dated 22.11.2022, we hereby declare thatthe Statutory Auditorof the Company, M/s Nemani Garg Agarwal & Co.(Firm Registration No. 010192N) hasissued Limited Review Report with Qualified opinion on theAudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarterand year ended on March 31, 2022.This is to inform you that there is no impact of audit qualification for the quarter ended 30.09.2022.

data.caption: OUTCOME OF BOARD MEETING - IN TERMS OF REGULATION 30 (6) READ WITH REGULATION 33 OF SEBI (LISTING OBLIGATIONS AND DISCLOSURE REQUIREMENTS) REGULATIONS, 2015
data.news_body: With reference to the above-mentioned captioned subject we hereby submit revised outcome of Board Meeting held on Monday, November 14, 2022 at 01.45 P.M. due to inadvertent error Board Meeting Concluded time not given which is required under SEBI Circular dated September 09, 2015, for Corporate Announcement filed under Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.The Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held on Monday, November 14, 2022 at 01.45 P.M. and concluded at 02.30 P.M considered and approved the following matters:1. Unaudited Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the half year ended September 30, 2022 along with the Statement of Asset and Liabilities and Statement of Cash Flow as on September 30, 2022.2. Limited Review Report on aforesaid Financial Results

data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the Board of Directors in their Meeting held today i.e Monday, November 14, 2022, has approved the un-audited financial results of the Company along with the Limited Review Report for the second quarter ended September 30, 2022.

data.news_body:
Dear Sir(s)

Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the Board of Directors in their Meeting held today i.e Friday, August 12 2022, has approved the un-audited financial results of the Company along with the Limited Review Report for the first quarter ended June 30, 2022.

You are requested to kindly take the same on your records.
